full_text: Page 2188 Ray and told him the US Attorney is meeting with him at 10 am tomorrow. So this probably should be some time after that interview. [b](5)[/b] Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone Page 11897 DOJ-OGR-00025996
